heading: Notice of forfeiture
text:
Notice of the institution of the forfeiture action shall be given by certified mail to all persons
  holding a security interest in such vehicle or tools, if known, if such security interest in the vehicle has been filed with the
  department of motor vehicles pursuant to the provisions of title ten of the vehicle and traffic law, at the address set forth in the
  records of such department, or, for vehicles not registered in the state of New York, all persons holding a security in terest in such
  vehicle if such security interest has been filed with the state of registration and which persons are made known by such state to the
  department, at the address provided by such state of registration.
